settings.hero_heading: Mulch and Weed Mat Solutions for Every Garden

custom_css: .wl_image-with-content_content a {background: #154734; padding: 20px 48px; color: #e9ddc6; text-align: center; font-family: Sora; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 100%; letter-spacing: 0.32px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 48px; transition: background 0.3s ease; width: fit-content;}

settings.image-with-content_text: Mulch & Weed Mats made from 100% New Zealand wool are the perfect natural solution for both home gardeners and commercial landscapers. These dense wool mats provide excellent moisture retention, giving plants a strong start, while breaking down over time to release essential nutrients like nitrogen and sulphur. This promotes healthy root development and robust plant growth, all while reducing weeds. Completely sustainable and biodegradable, these wool mats offer a practical and environmentally friendly choice for your gardening needs. Shop now

settings.image-with-content_heading: Mulch and Weed Mat Rolls for Versatile Garden Use
settings.image-with-content_text: Available in 5m, 10m, and 20m lengths, Wool.Life’s mulch and weed mat rolls are the go-to solution for gardeners of all scales—from small home plots to expansive commercial landscaping projects. Made from either new or recycled 100% New Zealand wool, these mats not only suppress weeds but also nourish your garden as they break down, enriching the soil with natural elements. Easy to install and environmentally conscious, our mulch and weed mat rolls offer an effortless way to keep your garden thriving while giving back to nature. Shop now
